introduction-to-blockchain-and-solana.title: Introduction to Blockchain and Solana
introduction-to-blockchain-and-solana.description: Discover the fundamentals of blockchain technology and explore how Solana revolutionizes decentralized computing with high-speed, low-cost transactions.

anchor-for-dummies.title: Anchor for Dummies
anchor-for-dummies.description: Master Anchor, the powerful Rust framework for Solana development, from basic setup to advanced patterns and deployment.

pinocchio-for-dummies.title: Pinocchio for Dummies
pinocchio-for-dummies.description: Learn Pinocchio, the lightweight and high-performance framework for building efficient Solana programs with minimal overhead.

introduction-to-assembly.title: Introduction to Assembly
introduction-to-assembly.description: Understand sBPF Assembly and its role in Solana programs. Learn how low-level instructions drive blockchain execution.

program-security.title: Program Security
program-security.description: Protect your Solana programs from common vulnerabilities and attacks with essential security best practices and patterns.

secp256r1-on-solana.title: Secp256r1 on Solana
secp256r1-on-solana.description: Implement Secp256r1 cryptographic signatures on Solana using both Anchor and Pinocchio frameworks.

tokens-on-solana.title: Tokens on Solana
tokens-on-solana.description: Explore Solana's token standards, mint and token accounts, and learn to work with the SPL Token program.

nfts-on-solana.title: NFTs on Solana
nfts-on-solana.description: Create and manage NFTs on Solana using Metaplex Token Metadata and Metaplex Core standards.

spl-token-with-web3js.title: SPL Token with Web3.js
spl-token-with-web3js.description: Master SPL Token operations with TypeScript and Web3.js, from minting to managing token authorities.

spl-token-with-anchor.title: SPL Token with Anchor
spl-token-with-anchor.description: Build robust token programs with Anchor framework, implementing all essential SPL Token functionalities.

token-2022-program.title: Token2022 Program
token-2022-program.description: Discover Token Extensions, the next evolution of tokens on Solana with powerful new features and capabilities.

token-2022-with-web3js.title: Token2022 with Web3.js
token-2022-with-web3js.description: Implement Token-2022 extensions with TypeScript, including transfer fees, metadata, and advanced token features.

token-2022-with-anchor.title: Token2022 with Anchor
token-2022-with-anchor.description: Build advanced Token-2022 programs with Anchor, leveraging all extensions for maximum functionality.

instruction-introspection.title: Instruction Introspection
instruction-introspection.description: Learn to inspect and analyze instructions within your Solana programs using Anchor and Pinocchio.

testing-with-mollusk.title: Testing with Mollusk
testing-with-mollusk.description: Write comprehensive tests for your Solana programs using Mollusk's powerful testing framework.

solana-pay.title: Solana Pay
solana-pay.description: Build payment solutions with Solana Pay, enabling seamless transfer and transaction requests.

create-your-sdk-with-codama.title: Create your SDK with Codama
create-your-sdk-with-codama.description: Generate type-safe SDKs for your Solana programs using Codama's IDL-based code generation.

winternitz-signatures-on-solana.title: Winternitz Signatures on Solana
winternitz-signatures-on-solana.description: Implement quantum-resistant Winternitz signatures on Solana with Anchor and Pinocchio.

testing-with-litesvm.title: Testing with LiteSVM
testing-with-litesvm.description: Accelerate your testing workflow with LiteSVM, supporting both TypeScript and Rust environments.

testing-with-surfpool.title: Testing with Surfpool
testing-with-surfpool.description: Master Surfpool's advanced testing capabilities for robust and reliable Solana program validation.
